name: Flights within the <Region> region earn <Points Earned> points

testSteps.description: 1: Flights within the Europe region earn 20 points ({Region=Europe, From=London, To=Paris, Points Earned=20})

children.description: Given Trevor is a new Frequent Flyer Member

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| London | Paris | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then his point balance should be 20 points

testSteps.description: 2: Flights within the ANZ region earn 25 points ({Region=ANZ, From=Sydney, To=Wellington, Points Earned=25})

children.description: Given Trevor is a new Frequent Flyer Member

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Sydney | Wellington | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then his point balance should be 25 points

testSteps.description: 3: Flights within the America region earn 35 points ({Region=America, From=Los Angeles, To=New York, Points Earned=35})

children.description: Given Trevor is a new Frequent Flyer Member

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Los Angeles | New York | Economy | 2021-03-01 |

testSteps.description: 4: Flights within the Asia region earn 50 points ({Region=Asia, From=Hong Kong, To=Seoul, Points Earned=50})

children.description: Given Trevor is a new Frequent Flyer Member

When he has completed the following flight
| From | To | Travel Class | Trip Date |
| Hong Kong | Seoul | Economy | 2021-03-01 |
Then his point balance should be 50 points

userStory.narrative:
Frequent Flyers earn status points each time they fly.
  As they earn more points, their status level increases and they get more benefits.

title: Flights within the <Region> region earn <Points Earned> points

rule.name: Flights within the same region earn a fixed number of points based
